name: Pico (Dream Diary Jam 5)
description:
A short demo of a Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam #5.

The jam this year was a bit of a roller-coaster... I started on one project at the start, got sick and gave up. Then I  realized it ended on the 26th, rather than the 16th.

I frantically worked on this entirely new project over the next 9 or so days, so please excuse any short comings it may have toward the jam requirements.

Also everything may be broken.

But hey, got that web deployment to work.

WASD to move

Z to interact

Press and hold Z to activate effect (there's only one this works with).

You know the drill.
